English: a row; a line; a series
genii; "immortals" of Taoism (those who by physical and mental refinement have succeeded in deferring death or becoming exempt from dissolution)

Qieyun: 羣開三B侵入?, 羣開三B鹽入?, 初開二咸入?, 羣開三嚴入?

English: the canopy of heaven。 to shelter
a kind of rush from which mats are made
a sphere; a mass; a lump
rush mats for kneeling on in temples
to salute by prostration and knocking the head; to kotow

Qieyun: 見開三B宵平?, 羣開三B宵平?, 見開三B宵上?
定合一歌上?, 定合一歌去?

English: to live austerely; to endure hardships

Qieyun: 見開四齊平?, 溪開四齊上?
English: to examine; to investigate. to prostrate oneself
to knock the ground with the head

Qieyun: 來三尤平?, 來三尤去?

English: to receive instruction; to obey instruction
the cocoon of the silkworm. corn; callosity
hands and feet badly chapped or blistered
to have intention to return home

Qieyun: 見開二銜平?, 見開二銜去?
English: a mirror; to glance at; to see

Qieyun: 明三陽平?, 明一唐平?
English: the awn of grain; a sharp point
to hurry off; to travel quickly

Qieyun: 影開一唐上?, 影開一唐去?
